A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Why should I care about the next movie?

Poe? Ruined by The Last Jedi.
Finn? Ruined by The Last Jedi.
Rey? Ruined by The Last Jedi.
The Rebels? No resources\, no ships. no allies.
Rose? I'd rather have Jar-Jar.
Han? Dead.
Leia? Carrie Fisher passed away.
Luke? Dead and ruined by The Last Jedi.

The only character I like now is Kylo Ren. Should I go into the next movie hoping he will kill the Rebels and rule the galaxy? No\, we all know that won't happen. What a shit movie\, it's full of plot holes\, cringe humor\, bad dialogue\, and an awful contrived story. When Luke says "the Jedi must end" he means Star Wars.

I feel terrible for both Mark Hamill and Carrie Fisher. Mark Hamill's most iconic character was just ruined and Carrie Fisher's last appearance as Leia was ruined.

It gets a single star for being gorgeous as hell.
